titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the period for the rollover of gain from the sale of a principal residence to a principal residence located in a disaster area.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the period for the rollover of gain from the sale of a principal residence if the new principal residence is located in a disaster area.
